bug.author: rwiesenfarth
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h5>System information (version)</denchmark-h>
OpenCV => master, commit 11b020b (and earlier) Operating System / Platform => any Compiler => any
<denchmark-h:h5>Detailed description</denchmark-h>
Severity => low Priority => low
One of the hook names is misspelled. If a hook is added with the correct spelling, it will not be used. <denchmark-h:h6>Actual version</denchmark-h>
CMakeLists.txt (toplevel): l.949: ocv_cmake_hook(POST_DETECT_DEPENDECIES) <denchmark-h:h6>Expected</denchmark-h>
CMakeLists.txt (toplevel): l.949: ocv_cmake_hook(POST_DETECT_DEPENDENCIES) (note the additional 'N') <denchmark-h:h5>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
n/a

comments.comment: Thank you! I will take a look on this.
